Quick_Strike.help: A quick attack that deals smashing and energy damage. This attack also has a chance to knock the target down.
Quick_Strike.shortHelp: Melee, Light DMG(Smashing/Energy), Chance for Knockdown(Foe)

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Body_Blow.help: A more powerful attack, this blow strikes the target for smashing and energy damage and reduces the damage potential. It also has a chance to stun the target.
Body_Blow.shortHelp: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smashing/Energy), -DMG(Foe,All), Chance to Stun(Foe)
Body_Blow.targetHelp: Your damage potential has been reduced. There is a chance you may be stunned.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You Stun {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.

Smashing_Blow.help: This forceful blow deals a good amount of smashing and energy damage and reduces the target's damage potential. It has a higher chance to stun the target than Body Blow.
Smashing_Blow.shortHelp: Melee, High DMG(Smashing/Energy), -DMG(Foe, All), Chance to Stun(Foe)
Smashing_Blow.targetHelp: Your damage potential has been reduced. There is a chance you may be stunned.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.

Power_Siphon.help: Power Siphon adds a small bonus to hit and modifies your other powers. These powers are now capable of draining the strength of your enemies and adding that strength to you. This effect will stack up to 5 times.

Repulsing_Torrent.help: This attack unleashes a powerful cone of energy that can smash foes. It has a high chance of knocking them back.
Repulsing_Torrent.shortHelp: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG(Smashing/Energy), Chance for Knockback(Foe)

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Burst.help: By focusing your energy into the muscles in your arms, you can launch a dizzying flurry of attacks against every foe in melee range, striking them for smashing and energy damage. Some foes may be hit hard enough to be knocked down.
Burst.shortHelp: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash/Energy), -DMG(Foe,All), Chance for Knockdown(Foe)
Burst.targetHelp: Your damage potential has been reduced.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Focused_Burst.help: Projects a burst of focused power over a short distance, causing smashing and energy damage and reducing damage potential. This attack may also knock down your foe.
Focused_Burst.targetHelp: Your damage potential has been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Total_Focus.help: This powerful attack focuses all the energy in your body into a single strike, causing smashing and energy damage. The attack also reduces a target's damage potential and has a chance to stun them.
Total_Focus.shortHelp: Melee, Extreme DMG(Smashing/Energy), -DMG(Foe,All), Chance to Stun(Foe)
Total_Focus.targetHelp: Your damage potential has been reduced. There is a chance you may be stunned.
